0P0000XT8B.L.long_name: Marlborough European Multi-Cap Fund Class P Income
0P0000XT8B.L.summary: The objective of the Scheme is to obtain capital growth.
0P0000XT8B.L.manager_bio: David graduated with a First Class degree in economics from Cambridge University before joining M&G, where he was a European equities fund manager with responsibility for small/mid caps. In 2000 David joined Baillie Gifford, where he took on responsibility for the European small cap portfolios and delivered strong outperformance. David joined the investment team in January 2013.

0P00016DE9.F.long_name: E.I. Sturdza Funds plc - Strategic European Silver Stars Fund A EUR
0P00016DE9.F.summary: The investment objective of the Fund is to outperform small and medium capitalization firms operating in European equity markets.
0P00016DE9.F.manager_bio:
"Bertrand Faure has been Managing Director of the Investment Adviser since its inception in 2002.
Prior to joining the
Investment Adviser he worked for
Och-Ziff Capital
Management Group in London between 1999 and 2001 as a hedge fund manager focusing on merger arbitrage and event-driven investments. Before joining Och-Ziff he worked in the investment banking division of Goldman Sachs International in London between 1997 and 1999 and was involved mostly in French related mergers and acquisitions and corporate finance projects. Bertrand is a graduate of the Ecole Polytechnique in Paris."
